alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 25 at 3:51PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...AREAS OF FOG WILL MOVE ONSHORE ALONG THE COAST FROM ST AUGUSTINE NORTHWARD TO ST SIMONS ISLAND THROUGH EARLY THIS EVENING... Areas of fog over the near shore waters are beginning to move onshore along the Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia coasts. The fog will push inland from the coast towards I-95 over the next couple of hours from St Augustine northwards through Fernandina Beach and into coastal Southeast Georgia including Brunswick and St Simons Island. Visibility may fall down to around a mile or less through sunset including around the Jax Beaches, Mayport, and along the St Johns river into trout river and into portions of downtown Jacksonville.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns
